sentences.english: And all the chores are traveling can make our perception of it.
sentences.chinese: 而一切紛擾的凡塵瑣事都能使我們感知它的意義。

sentences.english: Your Sim will cheer for and be exited about doing the basic things in life. Yay! Wooo!
sentences.chinese: 易興奮的市民就算只是做生活中普通瑣事也會興奮。

sentences.english: Distractions and annoyances are plentiful but don’t let the minor things get under your skin.
sentences.chinese: 爲瑣事分心和惱怒很常見，但是不要放在心上。

sentences.english: She raged against her husband for some household affairs.
sentences.chinese: 她爲一些家庭瑣事對丈夫大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Life eif made up of little things.
We spent the whole evening discussing domestic trivia .
sentences.chinese: 我們整個晚上談論家庭瑣事。

sentences.english: Don't befuddle me with all those masses of detail.
sentences.chinese: 不要拿一大堆瑣事把我搞迷糊。

sentences.english: Don't amte time in that kind of trivial thing.
sentences.chinese: 不能爲這種瑣事浪費具體時間。

sentences.english: They are no longer tied to the household chores and the job of bringing up their children.
sentences.chinese: 她們的工作不再僅限於家務瑣事和養兒育女。

sentences.english: A great man does not care about trifles.
Notice, too, how much time you spend on trivia.
sentences.chinese: 還必須注意你在瑣事上花的時間。

sentences.english: The most brilliant leadership can be mired in detail.
sentences.chinese: 最有才幹的領導也會陷於拘泥瑣事的困境中。

sentences.english: Do you sometimes feel that you are stuck in a rut?
sentences.chinese: 你是否時常感到深陷瑣事無力自拔？

sentences.english: He spent too much time on boondoggle, and that's why he went nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 他之所以不成功，是因爲在瑣事上花了太多時間。

sentences.english: But why waste time on trifles.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要在瑣事上浪費時間。

sentences.english: My time was taken up with a lot of trifles.
sentences.chinese: 我的時間給許多瑣事佔掉了。

definition: lit. chicken feathers and garlic skins (idiom)/fig. trivial (matter)
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
to haggle over every ounce/(fig.) to fuss over minor matters/to split hairs
